com.google.gwt.user.server.rpc.SerializationPolicy

Packages that use SerializationPolicy
Package
Description
com.google.gwt.user.server.rpc
Classes used in server-side implementation of remote procedure calls.
com.google.gwt.user.server.rpc.jakarta
Jakarta-specific package for server-only classes.
